metadata.title: CVE-2020-12394 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic flaw in our location bar implementation could have allowed a localattacker to spoof the current location by selecting a different origin andremoving focus from the input element. This vulnerability affects Firefox <76.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '76.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
